strafing_fire_over_event.description: [wwise]For air support and other strafe eagles.

flyby_distance.description: When the eagle gets inside this distance, trigger the fly-by audio event.

flyby_cooldown.description: Minimum time between fly-by audio events.

airstrike_pattern.description: Type of pattern to use for airstrike payloads.

projectile_type.description: Type of projectile for payloads that use one.

target_angle.description: Approach angle. 0 is front-to-back, 180 is back-to-front, relative to the stratagem ball and the helldiver.

search_radius.description: Radius in which to search for targets. Not used for the dive bomb.

fire_duration.description: Fire duration for weapons-based attacks (strafe, gunpods, rockets).

bomb_interval.description: Time between bombs are dropped after the first, and then successive ones.

bomb_prediction_interval.description: Time between re-evaluations on the bomb drop logic.

num_angles_to_try.description: Number of angles to try per height.

num_heights_to_try.description: Number of heights to try (from min to max, evenly spaced).

attack_movespeed.description: Speed of the eagle until it is done firing.

evade_movespeed.description: Speed of the eagle after it is done firing.

damaged_movespeed.description: Speed of the eagle after it is done firing.

damage_cooldown.description: When the eagle dies (takes a lot of damaage), it gets an additional cooldown for repairs of this many seconds.

master_target_position_adjustment.description: How far away from the stratagem ball can we go in order to find a better mass target?

master_target_enemy_count.description: Between how many enemies should we be trying to adjust the master target?

strafing_run_length.description: The length of the strafing run in meters. It starts half the length before the stratagem's location.

strafing_run_target_adjustment.description: How many meters can we strafe away from the strafing run in order to hit an enemy?

engine_start_audio.description: [wwise]Sound to trigger when the eagle spawns

engine_stop_audio.description: [wwise]Sound to trigger when the eagle despawns
